name: HypnopolisInteractive-aBMWPodcast
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hypnopolis interactive
des:
Return to the world of HYPNOPOLIS in this thrilling futuristic adventure. Thanks to the use of sustainable new technologies, humanity is cleaning up the planet just in time to save it. The effort is an ongoing one, and to falter is to fail. But when murderous eco-terrorists break their leader out of stasis, the future of humanity is threatened. Special Agent Glyph Frieden is assigned to track down the group, but to do so they’ll need the help of Jason Lin, a criminal currently serving time on ice. With the countdown to doomsday already ticking, can our mismatched heroes save the world?

** HYPNOPOLIS 2: UTOPIA IN PROGRESS is the action-packed sequel to the award-winning fiction podcast series from BMW. It was created in Munich, Hamburg, London and Venice (Los Angeles) for your entertainment. To learn more about the world of HYPNOPOLIS visit http://b.mw/hypnopolis2.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
